title: News: Vondelpark 30 Min Live Set
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/iheart-350x232.jpg "iheart")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8937-news-vondelpark-30-min-live-set/attachment/iheart/)

This is my first article amongst the gentle embrace of our new redesign. It’s the digital equivalent of a plush carpet under ones tired and beaten feet, it feels pretty fucking good. As it happens, so does the series of videos linked below. About a week ago **Vondelpark** headed into [Corsica Studios](http://bing.com/maps/default.aspx?v=2&pc=FACEBK&mid=8100&where1=Corsica+Studios%2C+London%2C+United+Kingdom&FORM=FBKPL0&name=Boiler+Room) to record a set for the Boiler Room, if you missed it check it out in full below. It also features a bro of mine on drums, Will Archer (A.K.A **SLIME**), that’s right; I have ‘relevant’ friends.
